events.functionDescription: Spawns NPCs based on information from the LayoutNPCs json data.

parameters.message: Functions.UtilNumberStringBuilder("Layout count for NPC generation is: ", layout_count_for_npcs, "")
Functions.UtilNumberStringBuilder("Next NPCs spawn tile X coordinate is: ", next_npc_spawn_tile_x, "")
Functions.UtilNumberStringBuilder("Next NPCs spawn tile Y coordinate is: ", next_npc_spawn_tile_y, "")
Functions.UtilDataStringBuilder("Next NPCs dialog tree data: ", next_npc_dialog_tree, "")
